lead_paragraph: The NCAA altered its timeout rules before the 2015-16 season, making it so coaches could no longer call one in live-ball situations.

headline.print_headline: Coaches Now Allowed to Call TO on Inbound Plays
headline.main: Coaches Now Allowed to Call TO on Inbound Plays

snippet: The NCAA altered its timeout rules before the 2015-16 season, making it so coaches could no longer call one in live-ball situations....
